datasets module

class datasets.Data(input_dir)

Bases: object

A class to represent a dataset.

Parameters: input_dir (str): The directory path of the input data.

Attributes: __train_set (dict): A dictionary containing the train dataset. __test_set (dict): A dictionary containing the test dataset. input_dir (str): The directory path of the input data.

Methods: load_train_set(): Loads the train dataset. load_test_set(): Loads the test dataset. generate_psuedo_exp_data(): Generates pseudo experimental data. get_train_set(): Returns the train dataset. get_test_set(): Returns the test dataset. delete_train_set(): Deletes the train dataset. get_syst_train_set(): Returns the train dataset with systematic variations.

delete_train_set()

Deletes the train dataset.

generate_psuedo_exp_data(set_mu=1, tes=1.0, jes=1.0, soft_met=0.0, ttbar_scale=None, diboson_scale=None, bkg_scale=None, seed=42)
get_syst_train_set(tes=1.0, jes=1.0, soft_met=0.0, ttbar_scale=None, diboson_scale=None, bkg_scale=None)
get_test_set()

Returns the test dataset.

Returns: dict: The test dataset.

get_train_set()

Returns the train dataset.

Returns: dict: The train dataset.
